hopobject.name: documentation
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.1) Gecko/2008070208 Firefox/3.0.1
hopobject.body: Connexions provides a set of on-line authoring tools for producing textbook materials licensed under Creative Commons. They provide a service for compiling and printing texts inexpensively or producing PDF documents. This is a great place to collaborate on Beagle Board related documentation intended for classroom education, but useful to all Beagle Board users.
hopobject.shortdesc: Creative Commons textbook regarding the Beagle hardware, software, and collaboration.
